publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-243.1.1 Patrick Harvie: Transportâ€”As an amendment to amendment (S3M-243.1) in the name of Ms Wendy Alexander, leave out from "further calls" to end and insert "agrees that other options for an airport link, such as connecting trams and the airport to the mainline rail network with an interchange at Gogar and opening a station on the main Fife line, should be examined."
